channel.title: Michael's Movie Reviews
channel.description: When you need good movie reviews come to our website because we are better...than everyone else.

item.title: The Dark Knight
item.description: The Dark Knight is a 2008 superhero film directed, produced, and co-written by Christopher Nolan. Based on the DC Comics character Batman, the film is the second part of Nolan's Batman film series and a sequel to 2005's Batman Begins.

item.title: The Dark Knight Rises
item.description: The Dark Knight Rises is a 2012 superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan, who co-wrote the screenplay with his brother Jonathan Nolan and the story with David S. Goyer.

item.title: Batman Begins
item.description: Looking to kickstart the old batman a new Bruce Wayne (Christian Bale) picks the cape back up to confront the criminal mastermind known as scarecrow.

item.title: Batman
item.description: Filmed in 1989. Where the legend begins, Bruce Wayne embraces batman
